title.narrative: Rights, citizenship and peace - EC Project Closure

description.narrative: For two years, CDPMM and Cafod, with the support of the European Union, have developed actions aimed at strengthening the capacities of young people, civil society organizations (CSOs), communities and local public institutions in the Magdalena Medio, to promote and promote processes of education and culture of peace, citizen coexistence, and social solidarity in harmony with the environment. This project will provide some additional support in the final year of that project and has as one of the results the successful closure of ICD962. It also seeks to collect the main lessons learned from the process that allows to develop projects in Magdalena Medio and in other territories to the development of socio-emotional skills, the exercise of rights, and education for peace. The transformations of the individual behaviors and collective behaviors expected, as well as the generation of favorable conditions for the sustainability of the institutional processes requires the sustained working together of educational institutions, the municipal, departmental entities and the Ministry of National Education. Therefore, this project is aimed at intersectoral management with State and CSO actors, while continuing technical support in 22 of the 34 prioritized educational communities during these two years, in order to consolidate the transformations.
